prologue.speaker: Bianca
prologue.text: What do you call a fake noodle?

prologue.speaker: Jon
prologue.text: Funny... wanna tell this joke to somebody else?

prologueHint: Some things begin with a laugh.

moveInTogether.speaker: Bianca + Jon
moveInTogether.text: We don't want the fun to stop. Let's move together.

moveInHint: Some things only work when shared. Push the boxes into the marked area.
homeBuildHint: Building takes trust. Stand together in the blueprint.
megabyteJoinHint: Every home finds its heart. Wait for Megabyte to join you.
megabyteWelcome: Welcome home, Megabyte. You're family now.
healthHint: Care changes everything. Bring Bianca close and press E near Megabyte.
crossroadHint: Not every companion is meant for every journey. Walk to the exit.
crossroadFarewell: Thank you for the path so far.
togetherForwardHint: Now the road is clear. Keep walking right.
lastTileInstruction: Approach the altar with Megabyte nearby.
proposalHint: Some things are made to last forever. Stand together on the altar.
